description:
Pennsylvania, Ohio and New Jersey Injury Lawyers

If you were injured in a car accident or through a doctor's negligence in Pennsylvania, New Jersey or Ohio, contact one of our experienced lawyers today for a free consultation.

At the Law Offices of Dallas W. Hartman, our experienced Super Lawyers focus on obtaining exceptional results for victims of automobile accidents, truck accidents, medical malpractice, defective products, workplace injuries, workers' compensation and others who have been injured or suffered a financial loss because of the negligence of another party in Pennsylvania and Ohio. We also hold attorneys accountable for negligence in cases of legal malpractice.

For over 25 years, our experienced attorneys have provided dedicated guidance and representation to clients seeking financial compensation for their injuries or the loss of a loved one. Our comprehensive personal injury practice addresses the needs of injured individuals and their families who are facing the financial pressure of unpaid medical bills and lost earning capacity.

Call 1-800-777-4081 for Experience You Can Rely On and a Reputation You Can Trust. We know recovery is possible because under the leadership of Dallas W. Hartman, our team of experienced lawyers has obtained some of the largest personal injury verdicts in the history of Pennsylvania. Our results speak for themselves.

Dallas personally oversees all of our cases and sees to it that every case is prepared to go to court. Unlike some lawyers, we are not afraid to fight for the full and fair compensation you deserve.

A Promise From Our Founder, Attorney Dallas W. Hartman:
"If we do not obtain a financial recovery in your personal injury case, you will not have to pay any attorney's fees or costs associated with our representation."

To discuss your case with an experienced personal injury lawyer who will work to get you the financial recovery you need, please contact us today.
